Articles.Content:
Been messing around with this craft for a few days now. Went through numerous designs as this is my first VTOL craft in KSP.
It has 4 Engines. 1 Rapier, 2 VTOL jet engines, and one front VTOL lifter jet engine (Quiztech Aero mod). It has a docking port on the front, RCS system, and air brakes. It can land and take off in water. You can also use it as a boat. It doesn't have wheels as it uses legs to land. Works with FAR.
The ship by itself will not make it to orbit but I made a launcher for it ;) The launcher has 4 LFBs and 4 SRBs and is pitched at 30 degrees and man does it get you to space fast.
It's still a work in progress so I haven't come up with a name yet so maybe somebody could help me :)


[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0jwDoAV.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZlHDZfV.jpg[/IMG]

[imgur]m2MLO[/imgur] Edited November 24, 2015 by jbakes
